title: Security Guard

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Security Guard can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Port Sarim Jail. He hands out the security book. Claiming that book from him is an easy task in the Falador Diary.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Security Guard
The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.
Security Guard
Released4 July 2006 (Update)
MembersNo
LocationPort Sarim Jail
ExamineThe Old School RuneScape Security Guard.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID5442

The Security Guard can be found on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Port Sarim Jail. He hands out the security book. Claiming that book from him is an easy task in the Falador Diary.

He is the twin brother of the Account security tutor in the Lumbridge graveyard.

Former random event[edit | edit source]

The Security Guard used to be a random event. If the player had their recovery questions set, he would give them a security book and possibly a reward. If the player already had a security book in their inventory, he would not provide another one.

The possible rewards included:

  • 20, 40, 80, 160, 320, or 640 coins
  • Uncut gems (sapphires, emeralds, rubies, or diamonds)
  • Half key (members only)
  • Cosmic talisman (members only)
  • Spinach roll
  • Kebab

The player was recommended by the Security Guard to visit the Stronghold of Security. Despite advertising the Stronghold, he could still appear when you actually were in the Stronghold.

If ignored for too long, the guard would attack the player. He could be attacked and killed, but this was not recommended: despite his max hit of 2, he had high Defence and a total of 250 Hitpoints, and each point of damage dealt to him yielded only a quarter of an experience point. Furthermore, he was immune to poison. If the player took too long to kill him, he would eventually disappear. If the player teleported away, he would say '[He/She] got away!' before disappearing.

[[File:Security Guard chathead.png|left]]
The '''Security Guard''' can be found on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} of the [[Port Sarim Jail]]. He hands out the [[security book]]. Claiming that book from him is an easy task in the [[Falador_Diary#Easy|Falador Diary]].

He is the twin brother of the [[Account security tutor]] in the [[Lumbridge#Graveyard|Lumbridge graveyard]].

==Former random event==
The Security Guard used to be a [[Random events|random event]]. If the player had their recovery questions set, he would give them a [[security book]] and possibly a reward. If the player already had a security book in their [[inventory]], he would not provide another one.

The possible rewards included:
*20, 40, 80, 160, 320, or 640 [[coins]]
*Uncut [[gems]] ([[sapphire]]s, [[emerald]]s, [[ruby|rubies]], or [[diamond]]s)
*[[Half key]] ([[members]] only)
*[[Cosmic talisman]] (members only)
*[[Spinach roll]]
*[[Kebab]]

The player was recommended by the Security Guard to visit the [[Stronghold of Security]]. Despite advertising the Stronghold, he could still appear when you actually ''were'' in the Stronghold.

If ignored for too long, the guard would attack the player. He could be attacked and killed, but this was not recommended: despite his max hit of 2, he had high [[Defence]] and a total of 250 [[Hitpoints]], and each point of damage dealt to him yielded only a quarter of an [[experience]] point. Furthermore, he was immune to [[poison]]. If the player took too long to kill him, he would eventually disappear. If the player teleported away, he would say '' '[He/She] got away!' '' before disappearing.

{{Discontinued random events}}
